[[2010â11 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|2010â11]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] football team has finished [[2008â09 TFF Second League|2008â09]] season in second place in [[TFF Second League]] Promotion Group and promoted to [[2009â10 TFF First League]]. This was the second promotion of the team and MÄ°Y became the first team that promoted to TFF First League twice. After formation of the league in 2001 (as Lig A), MÄ°Y became second team which relegated and then promoted again, after [[Adanaspor]] (the third became [[Ãanakkale Dardanelspor]] after promotion play-offs in [[2008â09 TFF Second League|2008â09]] season. [[Mersin idmanyurdu]] participated in [[2009â10 Turkish Cup]] and eliminated at third round, which was the play-off round for group stage. In play-off game [[Antalyaspor]] beat MÄ°Y after 11 penalties. ==2009â10 league participation== [[TFF First League]] was played as "Bank Asya Birinci Lig" due to sponsorship reasons. 18 teams attended. The winners and runners-up will promote to [[2010â11 SÃ¼per Lig]]. The third team to be promoted this year will be determined through promotion group games organized as a one-leg league system. Bottom three teams will be relegated to [[2010â11 TFF Second League]].
